revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Copy of receipts. The eleventh year of Imperator Caesar Trajanus Hadrianus Augustus, 3rd intercalary day of Mesore, for the account of the same month. Paid to Lysimachos son of Didymos, ex-inspector of the tax on fishing in the marshes of Tebetny and Kerkesis in the division of Polemon, by N.N. son of N.N. and N.N. and N.N. son of N.N. son of (?) Alexandros, and Patynis son of Patermouthis and Onnophris son of Psosneus at Talei in the division of Polemon 336 drachmas of debased silver; total 336 dr. Copy of another receipt. The twelfth year of Imperator Caesar Trajanus Hadrianus Augustus, Thoth 18 for the account of Mesore of the eleventh year. Paid to Lysimachos son of Didymos, ex-inspector of the tax and ï¿½ of the 11th year in the marshes of Tebetny and Kerkesis.
